name: Temple of Duality - DCJam23
description:
This was submitted to the 2023 Dungeon Crawl Jam.

https://itch.io/jam/dcjam2023

A clash is happening between the 2 gods of this world, one wishing to preserve the world and one wanting remake it anew. The player must climb to the top of the temple and put a stop to actions that will destroy the world as they know it.  They reside at the top of the temple.  What will you do when you reach the top?

Controls

ActionKeyboardControllerMovement WASD Left Stick  RotateQ & ELeft/Right ShoulderInteractSpace Bar Button South Duality Ring1DPAD NorthMapTabStart

Known Bugs

- Sometimes ramps cause you to fall through the ground

- Sometimes ramps won't let you move up to the next level

- Missing Ceiling tiles
